main event: Three bright, unusual objects were observed in the sky over Portsmouth, New Hampshire on April 12, 1967 around 11:30 PM.
interesting points: The objects were brighter than stars and appeared to be descending rapidly.
The observation lasted for approximately 1 minute.
The objects were described as resembling a 'flying disc' that was larger than a jet aircraft and flew at a very high speed, much faster than any known aircraft.
The witness estimated the speed of the objects to be around 1,800 miles per hour or faster.
The witness also reported seeing two other vehicles in the sky that resembled the sighting, which they believed were not satellites.
